verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> time <S%G5610><s%> had come <S%G2064><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would depart <S%G3327><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> having loved <S%G25><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> who were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> he loved <S%G25><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the end. <S%G5056><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> During <S%G1096><s%> supper, <S%G1173><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> having <S%G906><s%> already <S%G906><s%> put <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s son, <S%G2443><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

arose <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> supper, <S%G1173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid aside <S%G5087><s%> his <S%G3588><s%> outer garments. <S%G2440><s%> He took <S%G2983><s%> a towel, <S%G3012><s%> and wrapped <S%G1241><s%> a towel <S%G3012><s%> around his waist. <S%G1438><s%>

Then <S%G1534><s%> he poured <S%G906><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the basin, <S%G3537><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>' feet, <S%G4228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to wipe <S%G1591><s%> them with the towel <S%G3012><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> wrapped around him. <S%G1241><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he knew <S%G1492><s%> him who <S%G3588><s%> would betray <S%G3860><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> he <S%G2036><s%> said, <S%G2075><s%> "You are not <S%G3780><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> clean. <S%G2513><s%>"

You <S%G5210><s%> call <S%G5455><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> <S%G1320><s%> 'Teacher' and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord.' You <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> so correctly, <S%G2573><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> so I am. <S%G1510><s%>

I don't <S%G3756><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you. <S%G5216><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have chosen. <S%G1586><s%> But <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> may be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> 'He who eats <S%G5176><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> has lifted up <S%G1869><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heel <S%G4418><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>'

From now <S%G737><s%> on, <S%G3004><s%> I tell you <S%G5213><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> it happens, <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it happens, <S%G1096><s%> you may believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am he. <S%G1510><s%>

The <S%G3767><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> looked <S%G991><s%> at one <S%G1519><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> perplexed <S%G639><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> he spoke. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved, <S%G25><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> at the table, <S%G345><s%> leaning against <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' breast. <S%G2859><s%>

He, <S%G1565><s%> <S%G1161><s%> leaning <S%G1968><s%> back, <S%G1909><s%> as he was, on Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' breast, <S%G4738><s%> asked <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is it? <S%G2076><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore answered, <S%G611><s%> "It is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will give <S%G1929><s%> this piece of bread <S%G5596><s%> when I have dipped <S%G911><s%> it. <S%G2532><s%>" So when he had dipped <S%G1686><s%> the piece of bread, <S%G5596><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> it to Judas, <S%G2455><s%> the son of Simon <S%G4613><s%> Iscariot. <S%G2469><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> the piece of bread, <S%G5596><s%> then Satan <S%G4567><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G1565><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G3739><s%> you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> quickly. <S%G5032><s%>"
Now <S%G1161><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> at the table <S%G345><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> <S%G4314><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> thought, <S%G1380><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the money box, <S%G1101><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Buy <S%G59><s%> what things <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the feast, <S%G1859><s%>" or <S%G2228><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he should give <S%G1325><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> that morsel, <S%G5596><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> immediately. <S%G2112><s%> <S%G1161><s%> It was <S%G2258><s%> night. <S%G3571><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> <S%G3767><s%> he had gone out, <S%G1831><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Now <S%G3568><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> has been <S%G1392><s%> glorified, <S%G1392><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has been glorified <S%G1392><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has been glorified <S%G1392><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will <S%G1392><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will <S%G1392><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> him <S%G846><s%> immediately. <S%G2117><s%>

Little children, <S%G5040><s%> I will be <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> <S%G99999><s%> a little while <S%G3397><s%> longer. <S%G2212><s%> You will seek me, <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as I <S%G1473><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the Jews, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3699><s%> 'Where I <S%G3756><s%> am going, <S%G5217><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3756><s%> can't <S%G1410><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%>' so <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G737><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

A new <S%G2537><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you love <S%G25><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> just like <S%G2531><s%> I have loved <S%G25><s%> you; <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G1223><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> can't <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G3756><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> now? <S%G737><s%> I <S%G1410><s%> will lay down <S%G5087><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for you. <S%G5228><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Will you lay down <S%G5087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me? <S%G1700><s%> Most <S%G1700><s%> certainly <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3361><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> the rooster <S%G220><s%> won't <S%G3756><s%> crow <S%G5455><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> have denied <S%G533><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> three times. <S%G5151><s%>"
